physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a waterfall. The water is flowing from the background to the foreground of the photograph. Three people can be seen near the bottom of the waterfall, near a huge rock. There are trees and greenery in the background.
title_text: Kota Tinggi Waterfall Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Kota Tinggi (Johor, Malaysia) Waterfalls
